}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :''Lantech Advance Corporation''
This device has an integral antenna and a MMCX jack for an external one. :The [https://fccid.io/L8G8800002/Block-Diagram/Block-Diagram-259294.iframe ''Block Diagram''] in the FCC documents is nice. *[[Atmel]] AT76C503A (MAC) *[[RFMD]] RF3000 (BBP) *[[RFMD]] RF2948 (RFIC) *[[RFMD]] RF2494 (LNA/MIX) *[[RFMD]] RF2472 (RF AMP) *[[RFMD]] RF2189 (PA) *[[Silicon Labs]] Si4126 (Freq. Synt.) â€¢ [https://www.silabs.com/documents/public/data-sheets/Si4136.pdf Datasheet]
